anya-e0805n0:14_0: Tattha jinasāsanādhigamassa akkharakosallamūlakattā taṁ sampādetabbanti dassetuṁ abhidheyyappayojanavākyamidamuccate.
anya-e0805n0:22_1: te ca kho jinavacanānurūpā akārādayo niggahītantā ekacattālīsamattā vaṇṇā paccekaṁ akkharā nāma honti.
anya-e0805n0:22_3: ā i ī u ū e o,
anya-e0805n0:22_9: ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṁ-iti akkharā.
anya-e0805n0:28_0: Ṅa ña ṇa na mā sakaṭṭhānajā, nāsikaṭṭhānajā cāti.
anya-e0805n0:33_0: Evaṁ ṭhānakaraṇappayatanasutikālabhinnesu akkharesu sarā nissayā, itare nissitā. Tattha –
anya-e0805n0:34_0: Nissayādo sarā vuttā, byañjanā nissitā tato;
anya-e0805n0:44_0: Tattha tesu akkharesu akārādīsu okārantā aṭṭha akkharā sarā nāma honti.
anya-e0805n0:44_2: a ā i ī u ū e o-iti sarā.
anya-e0805n0:45_0: O anto yesaṁ te odantā, dakāro sandhijo, saranti gacchantīti sarā, byañjane sārentītipi sarā.
anya-e0805n0:48_0: Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu lahumattā tayo sarā rassā nāma honti. Taṁ yathā – a i u-iti rassā.
anya-e0805n0:49_0: Lahukā mattā pamāṇaṁ yesaṁ te lahumattā,
anya-e0805n0:52_0: Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu rassehi aññe dvimattā pañca sarā dīghā nāma honti.
anya-e0805n0:52_2: ā ī ū e o-iti dīghā.
anya-e0805n0:53_3: Kvaci saṁyogapubbā ekārokārā rassā iva vuccante. Yathā – ettha, seyyo, oṭṭho, sotthi.
anya-e0805n0:55_2: Saṁyogabhūte akkhare pare yo pubbo rassakkharo,
anya-e0805n0:55_3: so garusañño hoti. Yathā – datvā, hitvā, bhutvā.
anya-e0805n0:58_0: Dīgho ca saro garusañño hoti. Yathā – nāvā, nadī, vadhū, dve, tayo.
anya-e0805n0:60_0: Ṭhapetvā aṭṭha sare sesā aḍḍhamattā akkharā kakārādayo niggahītantā tettiṁsa byañjanā nāma honti.
anya-e0805n0:60_9: ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṁ-iti byañjanā.
anya-e0805n0:63_0: Tesaṁ kho byañjanānaṁ kakārādayo makārantā pañcavīsati byañjanā pañcapañcavibhāgena vaggā nāma honti.
anya-e0805n0:63_6: pa pha ba bha ma-iti vaggā.
anya-e0805n0:64_2: tattha pañcapañcavibhāgenāti vā pañca pañca etesamatthīti vā pañcapañcaso,
anya-e0805n0:66_2: aṁiti yaṁ akārato paraṁ vuttaṁ bindu,
anya-e0805n0:69_0: Idha avuttānaṁ parasamaññānampi payojane sati gahaṇatthaṁ paribhāsamāha.
anya-e0805n0:73_3: ya ra lava ha ḷā cāti ekavīsati ghosā nāma.
anya-e0805n0:74_0: Ettha ca vaggānaṁ dutiyacatutthā dhanitātipi vuccanti,
anya-e0805n0:78_11: asanto ettha na dissanti itīdha sarādisaññāyaṁ sabbasandhikaraṇaṭṭhāne byañjanaviyojanatthaṁ paribhāsamāha.
anya-e0805n0:80_2: sandhitabbe sarasahitaṁ pubbabyañjanaṁ anatikkamanto adhoṭhitamassarañca katvā sarato viyojayeti sarato byañjanaṁ viyojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:82_0: Sarā kho sabbepi sare pare ṭhite lopaṁ papponti.
anya-e0805n0:82_3: Bahuvacanaṁ panettha ekekasmiṁ sare pare bahūnaṁ lopañāpanatthaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:82_8: idaṁ pana suttaṁ upari paralopavidhānato pubbalopavidhānanti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:85_0: Sararahitaṁ kho byañjanaṁ adhoṭhitaṁ parakkharaṁ naye yutte ṭhāneti paranayanaṁ kātabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:85_2: tena ‘‘akkocchi maṁ avadhi ma’’ntiādīsu paranayanasandeho na hoti.
anya-e0805n0:89_0: Asamānarūpamhā saramhā paro saro lopaṁ pappoti vā.
anya-e0805n0:89_5: abhividhimhi ca vattamāno āupasaggo viya vāsaddo dvidhā vattate,
anya-e0805n0:95_1: upa ikkhati, upa ito, ava icca,
anya-e0805n0:95_4: yathā udake itīdha pubbāvaṇṇassarānaṁ lope kate ‘‘paro,
anya-e0805n0:97_1: ukārabhūto ca paro saro asarūpe pubbassare lutte kvaci asavaṇṇaṁ pappoti.
anya-e0805n0:99_0: Ettha ca satipi heṭṭhā vāggahaṇe kvacikaraṇato avaṇṇe eva lutte idha vuttavidhi hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:100_6: gacchāmi iti, ati ito, kikī iva,
anya-e0805n0:100_19: vi upasamo iccatra pubbassarānaṁ lope kate –
anya-e0805n0:103_0: Saro kho paro pubbassare lutte kvaci dīghabhāvaṁ pappotīti ṭhānāsannavasena rassassarānaṁ savaṇṇadīgho.
anya-e0805n0:106_7: sādhu iti itīdha parassarānaṁ lope kate –
anya-e0805n0:109_0: Pubbo saro parassare lutte kvacidīghaṁ pappoti.
anya-e0805n0:111_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Yassadāni, itissa, idānipi, tesupi, cakkhundriyaṁ, kinnumāva.
anya-e0805n0:114_0: Ekārassa padantabhūtassa ṭhāne sare pare kvaci yakārādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n0:115_0: Adhigato kho myāyaṁ dhammo, putto tyāhaṁ, tyāssa pahīnā, pabbatyāhaṁ, yyāssa.
anya-e0805n0:116_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Te nāgatā, puttā matthi. Antaggahaṇaṁ kiṁ? Dhammacakkaṁ pavattento, damento cittaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:117_3: ahaṁ kho ajja, yo ayaṁ, so assa, so eva,
anya-e0805n0:117_6: su āgataṁ, su ākāro, du ākāro,
anya-e0805n0:119_0: Okārukārānaṁ antabhūtānaṁ sare pare kvaci vakārādeso hoti. Ka kha ya tasaddādiokārassedaṁ gahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:124_0: Pubbo ivaṇṇo asarūpe sare pare yakāraṁ pappoti navā.
anya-e0805n0:125_0: Paṭisanthāravutyassa, sabbā vityānubhuyyate, byañjanaṁ, byākato, nadyāsanno.
anya-e0805n0:127_2: pati āharati, pati eti, iti assa, iti etaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:127_3: itiādi itīdha ‘‘ivaṇṇo yaṁ navā’’ti yakārādese sampatte –
anya-e0805n0:130_0: Sabbo tiicceso saddo sare pare kvaci cakāraṁ pappoti.
anya-e0805n0:130_2: itarathā kvaciggahaṇassa ca ‘‘atissa cantassā’’tisuttassa ca niratthakatā siyā.
anya-e0805n0:131_0: Accantaṁ , accodātā, paccayo, paccāharati, pacceti, iccassa, iccetaṁ, iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:133_0: ‘‘Te na vāivaṇṇe’’ti ito ‘‘na ivaṇṇe’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:135_0: Atiiccetassa antabhūtassa tisaddassa ivaṇṇe pare ‘‘sabbo caṁ tī’’ti vuttarūpaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0805n0:135_3: Ettha ca antasaddo saddavidhinisedhappakaraṇato atisaddantabhūtaṁ tisaddameva vadati,
anya-e0805n0:137_0: Ivaṇṇassa sarūpasmiṁ, yādeso ca na sambhave.
anya-e0805n0:138_3: evaṁ atīto, atīritaṁ, itīti, itīdaṁ, patīto.
anya-e0805n0:139_0: Abhi akkhānaṁ, abhi uggato, abhi okāso itīdha yakāre sampatte –
anya-e0805n0:142_0: Abhiiccetassa sabbassa sare pare abbhādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n0:146_0: Adhi agamā, adhi upagato, adhi ogāhetvā itīdha
anya-e0805n0:148_0: Adhiiccetassa sabbassa sare pare ajjhādeso hoti. Ajjhagamā, ajjhupagato, ajjhogāhetvā.
anya-e0805n0:152_0: Te ca kho abhiadhiiccete upasaggā ivaṇṇe pare abbho ajjhoiti vuttarūpā na honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:155_0: Dhaiccetassa sare pare kvaci dakāro hoti.
anya-e0805n0:156_0: Casaddena kvaci sādhussa dhassa hakāro, yathā – sāhu dassanaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:160_1: Dīghasaramhā parassa evasaddādibhūtassa ekārassa rikāro hoti,
anya-e0805n0:160_2: pubbo ca saro rasso hoti navā.
anya-e0805n0:164_0: Ivaṇṇauvaṇṇaiccete yathākkamaṁ jhalasaññā honti. Vaṇṇaggahaṇaṁ savaṇṇaggahaṇatthaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:166_0: Ākhyāte liṅgamajjhe ca, dviliṅgante ca dassanā.
anya-e0805n0:168_0: Jhalaiccetesaṁ iyauvaiccete ādesā honti vā sare pare, saralopo.
anya-e0805n0:173_0: Goiccetassa okārassa sare pare avādeso hoti samāse.
anya-e0805n0:173_3: Casaddaggahaṇena uvaṇṇassa uvaavādesā. Yathā – bhuvi, pasavo.
anya-e0805n0:176_0: Puthaiccetassa nipātassa ante kvaci gakārāgamo hoti sare pare.
anya-e0805n0:176_3: Ettha ca ‘‘sare’’ti nimittāsannavasena puthassa anteti labbhati.
anya-e0805n0:180_0: Pāiccetassa ante sare pare kvaci gakārāgamo hoti,
anya-e0805n0:180_1: pāssa anto ca saro rasso hoti.
anya-e0805n0:182_0: 34.Yava ma da na ta ra lā cāgamā.
anya-e0805n0:183_0: Sare pare yakārādayo aṭṭha āgamā honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:184_6: evaṁ māyidaṁ, māyevaṁ, taṁyidaṁ, taṁyeva, nayidaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:188_0: Dakārouupasagga saki kenaci kiñci kismiñci koci sammā yāva tāva puna ya te’tattasādīhi.
anya-e0805n0:188_3: evaṁ udayo, udapādi, udāhaṭaṁ, udito, udīritaṁ, udeti.
anya-e0805n0:191_0: Ādisaddena aññadatthaṁ, manasādaññā vimuttānaṁ, bahudeva rattiṁ, ahudeva bhayaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:192_0: Vāti kiṁ? Kenaci atthakāmena, sammā aññāya, yāvāhaṁ, tāvāhaṁ, punāparaṁ, attatthaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:193_0: Nakāro āyatādimhi. Ito āyati ito nāyati, ciraṁ nāyati.
anya-e0805n0:194_0: Takāro yasmā tasmā ajjādito ihaggādimhi. Yasmātiha, tasmātiha, ajjatagge.
anya-e0805n0:195_0: Rakāro ni dupātu puna dhī pāta caturādito.
anya-e0805n0:207_0: Itthiyaṁ vattamānā akārantato liṅgamhā paro āppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:210_1: paranayane ca kate ‘‘dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthavaṁ liṅga’’nti vuttattāva paccayantassāpi aliṅgattā
anya-e0805n0:210_2: vibhattuppattiyamasampattāyaṁ ‘‘taddhitasamāsakitakā nāmaṁ vā’tavetunādīsu cā’’ti ettha vaggahaṇena itthippaccayantassāpi
anya-e0805n0:213_1: tadā ghasañño hotīti ghasaññāyaṁ ‘‘ghapato ca yonaṁ lopo’’ti vikappena yolopo.
anya-e0805n0:216_0: Ghato parassa gassa ekāro hoti, saralopādi. Bhoti kaññe, bhotiyo kaññā kaññāyo.
anya-e0805n0:218_0: Tatiyādīsu ‘‘āya catutthekavacanassa tū’’ti ito ‘‘āyo, ekavacanāna’’nti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:220_0: Ghasaññato liṅgassākārā paresaṁ nādīnaṁ smiṁpariyantānaṁ ekavacanānaṁ vibhattigaṇānaṁ āyādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n0:223_0: Ghapato parassa smiṁvacanassa yaṁ hoti vā, aññatthāyādeso. Kaññāyaṁ kaññāya, kaññāsu.
anya-e0805n0:225_0: Saddhā medhā paññā vijjā, cintā mantā vīṇā taṇhā;
anya-e0805n0:226_0: Icchā mucchā ejā māyā, mettā mattā sikkhā bhikkhā.
anya-e0805n0:231_0: Pipāsā vedanā saññā, cetanā tasiṇā pajā;
anya-e0805n0:232_0: Devatā vaṭṭakā godhā, balākā parisā sabhā.
anya-e0805n0:234_0: Visākhā visikhā sākhā, vacā vañjhā jaṭā ghaṭā.
anya-e0805n0:235_0: Jeṭṭhā soṇḍā vitaṇḍā ca, karuṇā vanitā latā;
anya-e0805n0:236_0: Kathā niddā sudhā rādhā, vāsanā siṁsapā papā.
anya-e0805n0:242_0: Nāsā juṇhā guhā īhā, lasikā vasudhādayo.
anya-e0805n0:243_0: Ammādīnaṁ ālapaneva rūpabhedo. Ammā, ammā ammāyo.
anya-e0805n0:246_0: Ammā annāiccevamādito parassa gassa ālapanekavacanassa na ekārattaṁ hoti. ‘‘Ākāro vā’’ti rassattaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:253_2: tadā pasaññā hontīti pasaññāyaṁ ‘‘ghapato cā’’tiādinā yolopo,
anya-e0805n0:253_4: Rattī rattiyo ratyo vā, he ratti,
anya-e0805n0:257_0: Pasaññato ivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi paresaṁ nādīnamekavacanānaṁ vibhattigaṇānaṁ yāādeso hoti. Rattiyā,
anya-e0805n0:260_0: Paiccetasmā paresaṁ smiṁ smāiccetesaṁ yathākkamaṁ aṁ āādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:263_0: Pasaññassa ivaṇṇassa yovacanekavacanavibhattīnamādese sare pare yakāro hoti.
anya-e0805n0:263_1: Ettha ca yakārassevādhikārato pasaññaggahaṇena ivaṇṇova gayhati,
anya-e0805n0:266_0: Ādiiccetasmā smiṁvacanassa aṁ oādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:268_0: Patti yutti vutti kitti, mutti titti khanti kanti;
anya-e0805n0:269_0: Santi tanti siddhi suddhi, iddhi vuddhi buddhi bodhi.
anya-e0805n0:270_0: Bhūmi jāti pīti sūti, nandi sandhi sāṇi koṭi;
anya-e0805n0:271_0: Diṭṭhi vuḍḍhi tuṭṭhi yaṭṭhi, pāḷi āḷi nāḷi keḷi;
anya-e0805n0:272_0: Sati mati gati cuti, dhiti yuvati vikati.
anya-e0805n0:273_0: Rati ruci rasmi asani vasani osadhi aṅguli dhūli dundubhi doṇi aṭavi chavi ādīni ikārantanāmāni.
anya-e0805n0:278_0: Nadādito vā anadādito vā itthiyaṁ vattamānā liṅgamhā īppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:279_0: Saralope ‘‘kvacāsavaṇṇaṁ lutte’’ti asavaṇṇe sampatte pakatibhāvo nāmabyapadeso,
anya-e0805n0:280_0: Dutiyekavacane ‘‘ghapato smiṁ yaṁ vā’’ti ito ‘‘vā’’ti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:282_0: Pasaññato īkārato parassa aṁvacanassa yaṁ hoti vā.
anya-e0805n0:283_1: Yolopābhāve ‘‘tato yonamo tū’’ti ettha tusaddena yonamokāro ca,
anya-e0805n0:284_0: Ettha cevaṁ sijjhantānaṁ najjoādīnaṁ vuttiyaṁ ānattaggahaṇādinā nipphādanaṁ atraja sugatādīnaṁ viya nipphādanūpāyantaradassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:285_0: He nadi, he nadī he najjo he nadiyo, nadiyaṁ nadiṁ, nadī najjo nadiyo.
anya-e0805n0:286_0: Amādisutte ā patoti yogavibhāgena kvaci nāsānañcāttaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:289_0: Mahī vetaraṇī vāpī, pāṭalī kadalī ghaṭī;
anya-e0805n0:290_0: Nārī kumārī taruṇī, vāruṇī brāhmaṇī sakhī.
anya-e0805n0:291_0: Gandhabbī kinnarī nāgī, devī yakkhī ajī migī;
anya-e0805n0:292_0: Vānarī sūkarī sīhī, haṁsī kākī ca kukkuṭī –
anya-e0805n0:296_0: Mātula ayyakavaruṇaiccevamādīnamanto ānattamāpajjate īkāre paccaye pare,
anya-e0805n0:297_1: ‘‘O sare cā’’ti ettha casaddena ukārassa avādeso. Puthavī,
anya-e0805n0:298_1: Mahāvuttinā vā ‘‘gāva se’’ti ettha gāvaiti yogavibhāgena vā okārassa āvādeso. Gāvī,
anya-e0805n0:301_0: Ṇava ṇika ṇeyya ṇantuppaccayantehi itthiyaṁ vattamānehi liṅgehi īppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:304_0: Sabbasseva ntuppaccayassa takāro hoti vā īkārappaccaye pare,
anya-e0805n0:305_0: Evaṁ kulavatī, sīlavatī, yasavatī, rūpavatī, satimatī, gottamatī.
anya-e0805n0:306_0: Mahantasaddato ‘‘nadādito vā ī’’ti īppaccayo, ntubyapadeso vikappena takārādeso. Mahatī mahantī.
anya-e0805n0:309_0: Sabbasseva bhavantasaddassa bhotādeso hoti īkāre itthigate pare. Sā bhotī,
anya-e0805n0:312_0: Pati bhikkhu rāja iccetehi īkārantehi ca itthiyaṁ vattamānehi liṅgehi inīppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:313_0: ‘‘Saralopo’mādesa’’iccādisutte tuggahaṇena kvaci pubbalopassa nisedhanato ‘‘vā paro asarūpā’’ti saralopo.
anya-e0805n0:318_3: ‘‘Tato yonamo tū’’ti sutte tuggahaṇena yonamokāro ca,
anya-e0805n0:324_0: Evaṁ dhātu dhenu kāsu daddu kacchu kaṇḍu rajju kareṇu piyaṅgu sassuādīni.
anya-e0805n0:326_7: Mātarehi mātarebhi mātūhi mātūbhi mātuhi mātubhi,
anya-e0805n0:327_0: Evaṁ dhītā, dhītaro, duhitā, duhitaro iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:330_0: Jambū, jambū jambuyo, he jambu, he jambū jambuyo, jambuṁ, jambū jambuyo iccādi itthīsaddasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:331_0: Evaṁ vadhū ca sarabhū, sarabū sutanū camū;
anya-e0805n0:336_0: Kaññā ratti nadī itthī, mātulānī ca bhikkhunī;
anya-e0805n0:337_0: Daṇḍinī yāgu mātā ca, jambū gotitthisaṅgaho.
anya-e0805n0:345_2: Akārantehi napuṁsakaliṅgehi parassa sivacanassa aṁ hoti niccaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:348_0: Akārantehi napuṁsakaliṅgehi yonaṁ niccaṁ ni hoti.
anya-e0805n0:367_0: Kammaṁ, kammā kammāni, he kamma, he kammā kammāni, kammaṁ, kamme kammāni.
anya-e0805n0:370_0: Kammasaddantassa ukāra akārādesā honti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n0:370_2: Casaddaggahaṇena yuva maghavānamantassa ā hoti kvaci nā suiccetesu.
anya-e0805n0:371_0: Sasmāsu ‘‘u nāmhi cā’’ti ettha casaddena puma kammathāmantassa cukāro vā sasmāsūti uttaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:372_0: Smiṁvacane ‘‘brahmato tu smiṁnī’’ti ettha tusaddena kvaci ni hoti.
anya-e0805n0:374_0: Guṇavantu si, ‘‘savibhattissa, ntussa, simhī’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:376_0: Napuṁsake vattamānassa liṅgassa sambandhino ntuppaccayassa savibhattissa aṁ hoti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n0:377_0: Yomhi ‘‘ntussanto yosu cā’’ti attaṁ, ikāro ca. Guṇavanti, guṇavantāni, sesaṁ ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:378_0: Gacchanta si, ‘‘simhi gacchantādīnaṁ ntasaddo a’’miti aṁ. Gacchaṁ gacchantaṁ, gacchantā gacchantāni.
anya-e0805n0:383_0: Assaddhaṁ kulaṁ, assaddhā assaddhāni kulāni iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:390_0: Napuṁsakaliṅgehi paresaṁ sabbesaṁ yonaṁ ni hoti vā.
anya-e0805n0:391_1: aññattha niccaṁ yolopo, dīgho ca, aṭṭhī,
anya-e0805n0:392_0: Evaṁ satthi dadhi vāri akkhi acchi acci iccādīni.
anya-e0805n0:395_0: ‘‘Sukhabhārī si’’ itīdha anapuṁsakattābhāvā sismimpi ‘‘agho rassa’’miccādinā rassattaṁ, silopo.
anya-e0805n0:398_0: Ukāranto napuṁsakaliṅgo āyusaddo. Tassa aṭṭhisaddasseva rūpanayo.
anya-e0805n0:400_0: Evaṁ cakkhu vasu dhanu dāru tipu madhu hiṅgu siggu vatthu matthu jatu ambu assuādīni.
anya-e0805n0:407_0: ‘‘Cittā gāvo assa kulassā’’ti atthe bahubbīhisamāse kate ‘‘saro rasso napuṁsake’’ti okārassa ṭhānappayatanāsannattā rassattamukāro,
anya-e0805n0:414_0: Sabba, katara, katama, ubhaya, itara, añña, aññatara, aññatama, pubba, para, apara, dakkhiṇa, uttara, adhara, ya, ta, eta, ima, amu, kiṁ, eka, ubha, dvi, ti, catu, tumha,
anya-e0805n0:416_0: Bahuvacane ‘‘sabba yo’’ itīdha ‘‘parasamaññā payoge’’ti sabbādīnaṁ sabbanāmasaññā.
anya-e0805n0:419_1: tesaṁ sabbesaṁ sabbanāmasaññānaṁ liṅgānaṁ akārato paro paṭhamo yo ettamāpajjate.
anya-e0805n0:421_0: He sabba sabbā, he sabbe, sabbaṁ, sabbe, sabbena, sabbehi sabbebhi.
anya-e0805n0:423_0: ‘‘Ato, ā e, smāsmiṁnaṁ, āya catutthekavacanassā’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:425_0: Akārantehi sabbanāmehi paresaṁ smā smiṁ iccetesaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:425_1: catutthekavacanassa ca ā e āyaiccete ādesā neva hontīti āyādesābhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:425_3: tena pubbādīhi smā smiṁnaṁ ā e ca honti. Sabbassa.
anya-e0805n0:428_0: Sabbesaṁ sabbanāmānaṁ akāro ettamāpajjate naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n0:431_0: Sabbato sabbanāmato parassa naṁvacanassa saṁ sānaṁiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0805n0:433_1: Aññaṁ kaññāsaddasamaṁ aññatra sa naṁ smiṁvacanehi.
anya-e0805n0:434_0: Catutthekavacane ‘‘sabbanāmato vā’’, sabbato koti ito ‘‘sabbato’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:436_0: Sabbato sabbanāmato ghapasaññato smiṁ saiccetesaṁ yathākkamaṁ saṁsāādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:439_0: Ghasañño ākāro rassamāpajjate saṁsāsvekavacanesu vibhattādesesu paresu.
anya-e0805n0:442_0: Saṁ sāiccetesu ekavacanaṭṭhānasambhūtesu vibhattādesesu paresu liṅgamhā sakārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:446_0: Etehi sabbanāmehi ghapasaññehi parassa smiṁvacanassa neva āya yādesā hontīti āyābhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:446_1: Vādhikārato kvaci hoti dakkhiṇāya uttarāyāti ādi.
anya-e0805n0:448_0: Napuṁsake sabbaṁ cittaṁ, sabbāni, he sabba, he sabbāni, sabbaṁ, sabbāni. Sesaṁ pulliṅge viya ñeyyaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:449_0: Evaṁ katarādīnaṁ aññatamasaddapariyantānaṁ tīsupi liṅgesu rūpanayo.
anya-e0805n0:457_0: Dvandasamāsaṭṭhā sabbanāmakārato paro paṭhamo yo ettamāpajjate vā.
anya-e0805n0:459_1: Bahuvacane ‘‘dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā’’ti ettha parāti niddesato pubbādīhi yovacanassa vikappenekāro.
anya-e0805n0:460_1: he pubbe he pubbā, pubbaṁ, pubbe, pubbena,
anya-e0805n0:461_0: Itthiyaṁ pubbā disā, pubbā pubbāyo iccādi sabbāsaddasamaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:462_0: Napuṁsake pubbaṁ ṭhānaṁ, pubbāni, he pubba,
anya-e0805n0:465_0: Dvandaṭṭhā sabbanāmato parassa yovacanassa ṭhapetvā ettaṁ aññaṁ sabbanāmikaṁ kāriyaṁ na hotīti saṁsānamādesābhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:468_0: Bahubbīhimhi ca samāse sabbanāmikavidhānaṁ nāññaṁ hoti. Piyapubbāya, piyapubbānaṁ, piyapubbe.
anya-e0805n0:470_0: Dakkhiṇassā ca pubbassā ca yadantarāḷanti atthe bahubbīhi,
anya-e0805n0:471_0: Yatetasaddādīnamālapane rūpaṁ na sambhavati. Yasaddo aniyamattho.
anya-e0805n0:472_1: ye purisā, yaṁ, ye. Yā kaññā, yā yāyo, yaṁ, yā yāyo.
anya-e0805n0:473_0: Taeta ima amu kiṁiccete parammukha samīpa accantasamīpadūra pucchanatthavacanā.
anya-e0805n0:477_0: Eta taiccetesaṁ anapuṁsakānaṁ takāro sakāramāpajjate simhi vibhattimhi. So puriso.
anya-e0805n0:480_0: Taiccetassa sabbanāmassa takārassa nattaṁ hoti vā sabbattha liṅgesu. Ne te, naṁ taṁ, ne te,
anya-e0805n0:483_0: Taiccetassa sabbanāmassa sabbasseva attaṁ hoti vā sa smā smiṁ saṁ sāiccetesu vacanesu sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0805n0:484_0: ‘‘Smāhismiṁnaṁ mhābhimhi vā’’ti ito ‘‘smāsmiṁnaṁ, mhāmhī’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:486_0: Ta imaiccetehi katākārehi paresaṁ smāsmiṁnaṁ mhā mhiiccete ādesā na honti.
anya-e0805n0:488_0: Atha sarānameva sandhikāriye sampatte pakatibhāvo vuccate.
anya-e0805n0:491_0: Sarā kho sare pare kvaci chandabhedāsukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne,
anya-e0805n0:492_0: Tattha pakatiṭṭhānaṁ nāma ālapanantā anitismiṁ acchandānurakkhaṇe asamāse padantadīghā ca ikārukārā ca nāmapadantātītakriyādimhīti evamādi.
anya-e0805n0:494_0: Kvaciggahaṇena itismiṁ chandānurakkhaṇe sandhi hoti, yathā – sakkā devīti, namo te buddha vīratthu.
anya-e0805n0:495_0: Sareti kiṁ? Sādhu mahārājāti, evaṁ kira bhikkhūti.
anya-e0805n0:500_0: Nāmapadantaikārukāresu – gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi, pupphāni āhariṁsu, satthu adāsi.
anya-e0805n0:503_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare pakatirūpā hontīti yebhuyyena dīgharassalopehi vikārābhāvo. Yathā – accayo, paccayo,
anya-e0805n0:509_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci dīghaṁ pappontīti suttasukhuccāraṇachandānurakkhaṇaṭṭhānesu dīgho.
anya-e0805n0:510_2: madhuva maññati bālo madhuvā maññatī bālo,
anya-e0805n0:515_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci rassaṁ pappontīti chandānurakkhaṇe, āgame, saṁyoge ca rassattaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:518_0: Saṁyoge parākamo parakkamo, āsādo assādo, evaṁ taṇhakkhayo, jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi, thullaccayo.
anya-e0805n0:519_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Māyidaṁ, manasā daññā vimuttānaṁ, yathākkamaṁ, ākhyātikaṁ, dīyyati, sūyyati.
anya-e0805n0:520_0: Eso kho byantiṁ kāhiti, so gacchaṁ na nivattati iccatra –
anya-e0805n0:523_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci lopaṁ papponti,
anya-e0805n0:523_1: tatra lutte ṭhāne akārāgamo ca hoti.
anya-e0805n0:524_0: Esa kho byantiṁ kāhiti, sa gacchaṁ na nivattati, evaṁ esa dhammo, esa pattosi, sa muni, sa sīlavā.
anya-e0805n0:525_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Eso dhammo, so muni, so sīlavā.
anya-e0805n0:526_0: Casaddena etasaddantassa sarepi kvaci lopo. Yathā – esa attho, esa ābhogo, esa idāni.
anya-e0805n0:529_0: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa dvebhāvo hoti ṭhāne. Dvinnaṁ bhāvo dvibhāvo, so eva dvebhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:530_0: Ettha ca ṭhānaṁ nāma rassākārato paraṁ pa pati paṭikamukusa kudha kī gaha juta ñāsi su sambhū sara sasādīnamādibyañjanānaṁ dvebhāvaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:530_3: u du ni-upasagga ta catu cha santasaddādesādiparañca,
anya-e0805n0:535_0: Kamādidhātūsu – pakkamo, paṭikkamo, hetukkamo, ākamati akkamati, evaṁ parakkamati, yathākkamaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:539_0: Paggaho, viggaho, anuggaho, niggaho, candaggaho, diṭṭhiggāho.
anya-e0805n0:541_0: Kataññū, viññū, paññāṇaṁ, viññāṇaṁ, anuññā, manuññā, samaññā.
anya-e0805n0:548_0: Saramhāti kiṁ? Sampayutto, sampatijāto, sampaṭicchannaṁ, saṅkamanto, saṅgaho.
anya-e0805n0:551_0: Vatu vaṭu disādīnamante yathā – vattati, vaṭṭati, dassanaṁ, phasso iccādi.
anya-e0805n0:552_0: U du ni upasaggādiparesu – ukaṁso ukkaṁso. Dukaraṁ dukkaraṁ, nikaṅkho nikkaṅkhe.
anya-e0805n0:553_1: duccaritaṁ, nijjaṭaṁ, uññātaṁ, unnati, uttaro, dukkaro, niddaro, unnato, duppañño, dubbalo, nimmalo, uyyutto, dullabho, nibbatto, ussāho, dussaho, nissāro.
anya-e0805n0:554_0: Tathā takkaro, tajjo, tanninno, tappabhavo, tammayo.
anya-e0805n0:558_0: Ṭhāneti kiṁ? Nikāyo, nidānaṁ, nivāso, nivāto, tato, catuvīsati, chasaṭṭhi.
anya-e0805n0:559_1: abhibhūyya, viceyya, vineyya, dheyyaṁ, neyyaṁ, seyyo, jeyyo,
anya-e0805n0:564_0: ‘‘Sabbassa so dāmhi vā’’ti ito maṇḍūkagatiyā vāti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:566_0: Yakāravantānaṁ talanadakārānaṁ saṁyogabyañjanāni yathākkamaṁ calañajakārattamāpajjante vā.
anya-e0805n0:567_0: Kāraggahaṇaṁ yavataṁ sakāra ka ca ṭa pavaggānaṁ sakārakacaṭapavaggādesatthaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:567_1: tathā yavataṁ ta dha ṇakārānaṁ cha jhañakārādesatthañca,
anya-e0805n0:568_0: Jaccandho, vipallāso, aññāyo, yajjevaṁ, appekacce appekadā.
anya-e0805n0:572_0: Chandānurakkhaṇe – nappajjahe vaṇṇabalaṁ purāṇaṁ, ujjugatesu seyyo, gacchanti suggatinti.
anya-e0805n0:573_0: Vaggacatutthadutiyesu pana tasmiṁyevādhikāre ‘‘paradvebhāvo ṭhāne’’ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n0:576_0: Saramhā parabhūtānaṁ vagge ghosāghosānaṁ byañjanānaṁ yathākkamaṁ vaggatatiya paṭhamakkharā dvibhāvaṁ
anya-e0805n0:576_1: gacchanti ṭhāneti ṭhānāsannavasena tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamāva honti.
anya-e0805n0:577_0: Ettha ca sampatte niyamattā ghosāghosaggahaṇena catutthadutiyāva adhippetā,
anya-e0805n0:577_3: tammayo’’tiādīsu vaggapañcamānaṁ satipi ghosatte tatiyappasaṅgona hoti,
anya-e0805n0:578_0: Gharādīsu pa u du niādiparacatutthesu tāva –
anya-e0805n0:579_0: Yavata mādesādīsu – bojjhaṅgā, āsabbhaṁ, bujjhitabbaṁ, bujjhati.
anya-e0805n0:580_0: Ṭhāneti kiṁ? Sīlavantassa jhāyino, ye jhānappasutā dhīrā, nidhānaṁ, mahādhanaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:583_0: Saramhāti kiṁ? Saṅkhāro, taṅkhaṇe, sañchannaṁ, taṇṭhānaṁ, santhuto, tamphalaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:584_0: Ṭhāneti kiṁ? Pūvakhajjakaṁ, tassa chaviyādīni chinditvā, yathā ṭhitaṁ, kathaṁ, kammaphalaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:585_2: ‘‘do dhassa cā’’ti ettha caggahaṇassa bahulatthattā tena caggahaṇena yathāpayogaṁ bahudhā ādeso siyā.
anya-e0805n0:586_1: ni upasaggato kamu pada ci cara tarānaṁ paṭhamassa vaggadutiyo iminā dvittaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:587_0: Tathā bo vassa kuva diva siva vajādīnaṁ dvirūpassāti vakāradvayassa bakāradvayaṁ, yathā – kubbanto,
anya-e0805n0:590_0: Ko tassa niyatādīnaṁ kvaci. Niyato niyako.
anya-e0805n0:591_0: Yo jassa nijādissa vā, nijaṁputtaṁ niyaṁputtaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:593_2: evaṁ paṇipāto, paṇāmo, paṇītaṁ, pariṇato, pariṇāmo,
anya-e0805n0:596_0: Patiiccetassa upasaggassa sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci paṭiādeso hoti pubbassaralopo. Paṭaggi,
anya-e0805n0:600_0: Puthaiccetassa anto saro ukāro hoti byañjane pare, dvittaṁ. Puthujjano, puthubhūtaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:601_2: ‘‘Puthassa a putha’’iti samāseneva siddhe puna antaggahaṇādhikārena kvaci aputhantassāpi uttaṁ sare.
anya-e0805n0:602_0: Mano aññaṁ manuññaṁ, evaṁ imaṁ evumaṁ, paralopo, iti evaṁ itvevaṁ, ukārassa vakāro.
anya-e0805n0:606_0: Avaiccetassa upasaggassa okāro hoti kvaci byañjane pare. Okāso, onaddho, ovadati, osānaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:612_0: Avasaddassa upapade tiṭṭhamānassa tassokārassa viparīto ca hoti byañjane pare.
anya-e0805n0:617_0: Byañjane pare kvaci okārāgamo hotīti atippa parasaddehi okārāgamo ‘‘yavamada’’iccādisutte casaddena atippato gakārāgamo ca.
anya-e0805n0:618_0: Atippago kho tāva, parosataṁ, parosahassaṁ, ettha ‘‘sarā sare lopa’’nti pubbassaralopo.
anya-e0805n0:630_0: Vaggabhūte byañjane pare niggahītaṁ kho vaggantaṁ vā pappotīti nimittānusvarānaṁ ṭhānāsannavasena tabbaggapañcamo hoti.
anya-e0805n0:632_0: Idha na bhavati, na taṁ kammaṁ kataṁ sādhu, saraṇaṁ gacchāmi.
anya-e0805n0:633_0: Sati copari vāggahaṇe vijjhantare vā idha vāggahaṇakaraṇamatthantaraviññāpanatthaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:633_1: tena niggahītassa saṁupasaggapumantassa le lakāro. Yathā –
anya-e0805n0:634_0: Paccattaṁ eva, taṁ eva, tañhi tassa, evañhi vo itīdha ‘‘vā’’ti adhikāro.
anya-e0805n0:636_0: Ekārahakāre pare niggahītaṁ kho ñakāraṁ pappoti vā, ekāre ñādesassa dvibhāvo.
anya-e0805n0:637_0: Paccattaññevapaccattaṁ eva, taññeva taṁ eva, tañhi tassa tañhi tassa, evañhi vo evañhi vo.
anya-e0805n0:638_0: Vavatthitavibhāsattā vāsaddassa evahinipātato aññattha na hoti, yathā – evametaṁ, evaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n0:639_0: Saṁyogo, saṁyojanaṁ, saṁyato, saṁyācikāya, yaṁ yadeva, ānantarikaṁ yamāhu itīdha ‘‘ña’’miti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:641_0: Niggahītaṁ kho yakāre pare saha yakārena ñakāraṁ pappoti vā, ñādesassa dvittaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:643_0: Vāsaddassa vavatthitavibhāsattāva saṁpadantato ca sabbanāmayakāraparato ca niggahītā aññattha na hoti. Yathā –
anya-e0805n0:644_0: Ettha ca ‘‘saha ye cā’’ti vattabbe ‘‘sa ye cā’’ti vacanato suttantesu sukhuccāraṇatthamakkharalopopīti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0805n0:644_2: sayaṁ abhiññāya sacchikatvā sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā,
anya-e0805n0:647_0: Niggahītassa kho sare pare makāradakārādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n0:647_1: Ettha ca vāsaddādhikārassa vavatthitavibhāsattā dakāro yatetasaddato parasseva.
anya-e0805n0:649_0: Vāti kiṁ? Taṁ ahaṁ, etaṁ eva, akkocchi maṁ avadhi maṁ.
anya-e0805n0:650_0: Ettha ca madāti yogavibhāgena byañjanepi vā makāro.
anya-e0805n0:651_0: Tāsaṁ ahaṁ santike, vidūnaṁ aggaṁ, tassa adāsiṁ ahaṁ itīdha ‘‘sare’’ti vattate.
anya-e0805n0:653_0: Niggahītaṁ kho sare pare lopaṁ pappoti kvaci chandānurakkhaṇe sukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne.
anya-e0805n0:654_0: Tāsāhaṁ santike, vidūnaggaṁ, tassa adāsāhaṁ, tathāgatāhaṁ, evāhaṁ, kyāhaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:658_0: Niggahītaṁ kho byañjane ca pare lopaṁ pappoti kvaci chandānurakkhaṇādimhi.
anya-e0805n0:659_1: etaṁ buddhāna sāsanaṁ, sāratto, sārāgo, sārambho,
anya-e0805n0:661_5: kiṁ idāni, tvaṁ asi, idaṁ api,
anya-e0805n0:663_0: Niggahītamhā paro saro lopaṁ pappoti vā. Niggahītassa vaggantattaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:665_0: Vāti kiṁ? Kataṁ iti, kimiti, dātumapi, sāmaṁ eva.
anya-e0805n0:666_0: Ayampi vāsaddassa vavatthitavibhāsattā itīvīdānisīpevādito aññattha na hoti. Yathā –
anya-e0805n0:667_1: pupphaṁ assā uppajjati itīdha sare pare lutte vipariṇāmena ‘‘parasmiṁ, sare,
anya-e0805n0:669_0: Niggahītamhā parasmiṁ sare lutte byañjano saññogo ce,
anya-e0805n0:671_0: Evaṁ sa te āsavā, pupphaṁsā uppajjati.
anya-e0805n0:673_0: Casaddena tiṇṇaṁ byañjanānaṁ sarūpasaṁyogopi visaññogo hoti. Yathā – agyāgāraṁ, vutyassa.
anya-e0805n0:676_0: Niggahītañca āgamo hoti sare vā byañjane vā kvaci sukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne.
anya-e0805n0:678_0: Kvacīti kiṁ? Na hi etehi, idha ceva.
anya-e0805n0:679_3: aggiṁva sanamaṁ itīdha lopādesakāriye sampatte yebhuyyena tadapavādatthamāha.
anya-e0805n0:681_0: Niggahītaṁ kho byañjane pare aṁiti hoti.
anya-e0805n0:683_0: Evaṁ vutte, taṁ sādhu, ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā, aggiṁva sandhamaṁ.
anya-e0805n0:686_0: Ye idha amhehi visesato na upadiṭṭhā upasagganipātādayo,
anya-e0805n0:686_1: tesaṁ vuttayogato vuttanayena sarasandhādīsu vuttanayānusārena rūpasiddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0805n0:687_0: Tena ‘‘do dhassa cā’’ti sutte casaddena pariyādīnaṁ rahanādivaṇṇassa vipariyayo yavādīhi, yathā –
anya-e0805n0:688_0: ‘‘Taṁ imināpi jānāthā’’ti ettha ‘‘paro vā saro’’ti sare lutte ‘‘tatrākāro’’ti yogavibhāgena akāro niggahītassa dakāro,
